Control.ttp: nlThis page provides information related to Security Settings.
nlThe username used for logging into the PAC.
nlWhen checked, indicates no password is required for this user to login to the PAC.
nlThe password used for logging into the PAC.
nlThe password used for logging into the PAC. (Must match the password entered above.)
nlWhen checkmarked, indicates that this user is currently enabled.
nlDate and time this user was first added to the database.
nlDate and time of the last modifications made to this user.
nlLevel of access granted to this user.
nlClick to display online help related to this page...
nlClick to begin adding a new user...
nlClick to indicate the selected user should be removed...
nlClick to save the current user information to the database...
nlClick to refresh the contents of this page...
nlClick to collapse all the groups in the grid...
nlClick to expand all the groups in the grid...
nlThe username used for logging into the PAC
nlIndicates the level of access granted to this user.
nlThe date and time the user was added to the database.
nlThe date and time of the last modification.
nlIndicates whether the user is currently enabled or not.
nlThe date and time the user last accessed the database via the corresponding IP Address.
nlThe IP Address(es) the user accessed the database from.

Messages.Message: nlPassword must be at least {0} characters in length.
nlNew Password and Confirm Password must match.
nlUsername must be at least {0} characters in length.
